pricingPlans.name: Pay-As-You-Go
features: See [Full Pricing Details](https://www.notion.so/Enterprise-Pricing-dd54b64b2fcc43c1811ead80e004a1e2), we offer flexible pricing options.
The more you verify, the **lower your total cost**.

saas.name: Reacher
saas.heading: **Open-Source Email Verification API**
saas.subheading: Prevent bounced emails with world-class email verification. Free for personal use.

features.name: Yes, it scales
features.desc: Our cutting-edge infrastructure leverages horizontal scaling technology. It fits well for high-volume **spam sign-up prevention**, or **cleaning large lists**.

features.name: Warp Speeds
features.desc: Reacher is built with the fast and performant Rust programming language, using the [Warp](https://github.com/seanmonstar/warp) framework. For real-time email verification, it's fast.

features.name: Highest Accuracy Possible
features.desc: We won't play small, this email verification tool actually connects to the mail server and checks in **real-time** if the email exists. We don't use historical data.

features.name: Fully Featured
features.desc: We check for MTA, MX records, SMTP, hard bounces, catch-all, disposable email, role-based accounts... and [much more](https://www.notion.so/reacherhq/How-Reacher-Verifies-Emails-2927ca5191d744e6b15652fc08d2dd3d).

features.name: Privacy Guaranteed
features.desc: It's simple: once you get the result of your email verifications, we delete everything on our side. We are 100% GDPR compliant.

features.name: Free for Personal Use
features.desc: Start with **50 free** emails every month. Scale with our [pay-as-you-go](/pricing) plans afterwards.

features.name: Bulk Verification
features.desc: Clean your large email lists by using our [JavaScript SDK](https://github.com/reacherhq/reacher-js) to perform bulk email verification.

features.name: Powerful API
features.desc: Advanced integrations available programatically via our [REST API](/docs#section/API).

features.name: Open-Source
features.desc: In order to guarantee transparency with your data, Reacher is 100% [open-source](https://github.com/reacherhq)! We also offer the possibility to self-host the service yourself.
